form100.title: Health Status Certificate
form100.legalReference: Approved by Georgian Ministry of Labor, Health and Social Affairs Order #230/n dated 15.10.2008
form100.field1.label: Name of the institution issuing the certificate and/or doctor specialist's surname, name, specialty assigned by state certificate. State certificate number and/or contact information
form100.field2.label: Institution name, address where certificate is sent
form100.field2a.label: By appointment
form100.field2b.label: To be presented
form100.field3.label: Patient's first name and surname
form100.field4.label: Date of birth (day/month/year)
form100.field5.label: Personal ID number
form100.field5.note: Filled for persons 16 years and older
form100.field6.label: Address
form100.field7.label: Workplace and position (for student - name of educational institution/school and class/course where they study)
form100.field8.label: Dates
form100.field8a.label: a) Visit to doctor
form100.field8b.label: b) Sent to hospital
form100.field8c.label: c) Placed in hospital
form100.field8d.label: d) Discharge
form100.field9.label: Conclusion about health status or full diagnosis (main disease, accompanying diseases, complications)
form100.field10.label: Past diseases
form100.field11.label: Brief anamnesis
form100.field12.label: Conducted diagnostic examinations and consultations
form100.field13.label: Course of illness
form100.field14.label: Treatment provided
form100.field15.label: Condition at hospital admission
form100.field16.label: Condition at hospital discharge
form100.field17.label: Treatment and work recommendations
form100.field18.label: Attending physician (specialist doctor)
form100.field19.label: Signature of institution head/deputy head/attending physician (specialist doctor)
form100.field20.label: Certificate issue date
